title: The new NON-REGION system
body:
1. This system fucked my game!
2. I think this is THE STUPIDEST THING I HAVE EVER SAW IN LoL!
 3. I lost 3 ACCOUNTS one was 27lvl (ik im noob but i loved it and had so much champs) and the second 15lvl and the third was 16lvl.
 4. I think its better to loose your time to switch from Brazil,EUNE,EU,NA.......
5. This I think, should be removed and so you and everyone (and me too) get our accounts back!
6.  I deleted LoL 'cuz i raged sooo much!
7.  I want this removed!

replies.body: What do you mean by losing accounts? You should still be able to log in with your old accounts. Are you seeing  a particular error?

No account is deleted. Read before ranting:
https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/XbalfWLe-the-region-selector-will-be-removed-from-the-login-screen-starting-next-week
https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360043328413-Regionless-Accounts-League-of-Legends
Wait, did I miss something? Do they delete alts now?

Sorry mate, the Downgrade was a terrible idea that players responded to in an overwhelmingly negative manner, but if Riot ignored all the feedback back then, theyll ignore it now. Shame about all the usernames permanently lost as a result of choosing the worst way of resolving username conflicts, but what can you do.
